definitions.definition: Having happened a short while ago.
Having done something a short while ago that distinguishes them as what they are called.
definitions.example: I met three recent graduates at the conference.

definitions.definition: Particularly in geology, palaeontology, and astronomy: having occurred a relatively short time ago, but still potentially thousands or even millions of years ago.
(capitalised as "Recent") Of the Holocene, particularly pre-21st century.
